# robotss.txt for HabitRats Landing Page
# Allow all crawlers to index the site

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://habitrats.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (polite crawling)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Specific rules for common crawlers
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 0

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow private or admin areas (if any)
# Disallow: /admin/
# Disallow: /private/
